title: Guilloche font or similar
content:
I'm looking for a symbol/ornament font, which will produce guilloche ornaments (those fine mostly endlessly repeating lines found on paper money or identity documents).  
I already tried to find by the keyword "guilloche" but that wasn't successful.  
Does anybody know of a font, which will build those patterns or at least quite similar?  
(I know Hypnopaedia and similar, but that doesn't really fit. I need more linear patterns.)  
Thanks for all hints!  
best regards  
Michael
author: saccade
